projects.title: CardioVizion
projects.description: Co-founded a startup that aims to develop wearable technology for remote cardiac monitoring and prediction. Working to partner with medical schools and biotechnology organization in Canada.

projects.title: Web3.0 Trading Bot
projects.description: Automatically discovers and purchases the newest deployed smart contracts on the Binance smart chain network by connecting to a users Metamask wallet.

projects.title: Spacebook - Moon Mission Dashboard
projects.description: Spacebook aims to connect people and astronauts alike. It allows for seamless integration of console log information from moon missions to all people and allows them to comment and investigate the information with support!

projects.title: MedHacks - COVID19 Prediction Model
projects.description: Hosted a predictive ML model for identifying COVID-19 in CT scans and X-Rays of the lungs.

projects.title: Trace The Bug
projects.description: Data analysis project that correlates changes in Google mobility data to changes in COVID-19 cases in Ontario based on user location and date

projects.title: Project Uni
projects.description: A Web application intended to connect Current and future university students together through a blog-post application

projects.title: COVID-19 Tracker
projects.description: Dashboard to track global spread of COVID-19 with statistics from different countries and states.

projects.title: 3D Unity Runner Game
projects.description: Game developed in Unity that allows players to run infinitely dodging obstacles as a ball.

projects.title: SumoBots
projects.description: Source code uploaded to an Arduino to control a 3D printed robot participating in battles with other robots.
